May 12, 2001 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-championship-section
Test Piece Contest
Tallis Variations
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Duncan Broadley (Tongwynlais) Best Horn Player: Natalie Gibson (Parc and Dare) Prizes - 1st £125, 2nd £75, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed
Feb. 26, 2011, 6:58 p.m. June 30, 2020, 8:58 p.m.
